FAQ Section.Layout: Grid-based layout with multiple columns, each containing a question and answer pair.
FAQ Section.Design: Clean, structured, and user-friendly. Each FAQ item is enclosed in a rounded card with an icon, question, and answer.

Key Elements.Section Heading: Centered, bold heading with a brief description or introduction.
Key Elements.Grid Layout: Responsive grid that adapts to different screen sizes with three columns on larger screens and two columns on smaller screens.
Key Elements.FAQ Items: Each item is a card with an embedded icon, a question in a bold font, and an answer in a lighter font.
Key Elements.Icons: Positioned at the top-left of each card, visually distinguishing each FAQ item.

FAQ Section.Use Cases: Ideal for product websites, service pages, and any platform needing a dedicated FAQ section to address common questions and enhance user experience.
